package.name: org.openscales.core
package.shortDescription: Pure ActionScript3/Flash10 OpenScales core, no dependency on Flex

package.name: org.openscales.core.basetypes.maps
package.shortDescription: Hashmap implementation since none is provided in ActionScript3

package.name: org.openscales.core.basetypes.linkedlist
package.shortDescription: Linkedlist implementation used in Grid layers. May be replaced by Vector in future version

package.name: org.openscales.core.configuration
package.shortDescription: Ability to configure an OpenScales map from a XML configuration file passed as parameter. This is especially useful because OpenScales is by nature compiled to a static SWF file. This xml configuration file make it possible to customize the map at runtime

package.name: org.openscales.core.control
package.shortDescription: Pure ActionScript 3 controls are graphical component used to control the map and display informations

package.name: org.openscales.core.control.ui
package.shortDescription: Reusable control sub components

package.name: org.openscales.core.cursor
package.shortDescription: OpenScales custom cursors

package.name: org.openscales.core.events
package.shortDescription: OpenScales events are strongly typed, dispatched using the map as an event bus. They have a name, and usually carry the context of the event

package.name: org.openscales.core.filter
package.shortDescription: Feature filter used to define feature styles

package.name: org.openscales.core.feature
package.shortDescription: Features are a geolocalized graphical element

package.name: org.openscales.core.format
package.shortDescription: Protocol or file format implentations

package.name: org.openscales.core.handler
package.shortDescription: Handlers react to user event to modify the map state (zoom, position). Handlers can dispatch high level events that will be used to interact with controls

package.name: org.openscales.core.handler.mouse
package.shortDescription: Mouse related handlers

package.name: org.openscales.core.handler.feature
package.shortDescription: Feature drawing related handlers

package.name: org.openscales.core.handler.zoom
package.shortDescription: Zoom related handlers

package.name: org.openscales.core.layer
package.shortDescription: Layers display raster or vector data on the map, usually loaded from a remote datasource. There is a lot of different kind of layers (WMS, OpenStreetMap, KML ...)

package.name: org.openscales.core.layer.capabilities
package.shortDescription: Get capabilities related classes

package.name: org.openscales.core.layer.ogc
package.shortDescription: OGC standardized protocols related classes

package.name: org.openscales.core.layer.osm
package.shortDescription: Open Street map related classes

package.name: org.openscales.core.layer.params
package.shortDescription: HTTP parameters abstraction

package.name: org.openscales.core.layer.params.ogc
package.shortDescription: OGC abstract parameters

package.name: org.openscales.core.popup
package.shortDescription: Classes related to popup display, usually displayed after a click on a feature

package.name: org.openscales.core.request
package.shortDescription: OpenScales wrapper around ActionScript3 remote request (XML or data like images)

package.name: org.openscales.core.security
package.shortDescription: Security management for intended to access to protected GIS layers. Maybe used with WSS, IGN GeoDRM or basic authentication

package.name: org.openscales.core.security.events
package.shortDescription: Security events

package.name: org.openscales.core.security.ign
package.shortDescription: IGN GeoRM Security implementation

package.name: org.openscales.core.style
package.shortDescription: Style describe graphical attributes used to render vectors

package.name: org.openscales.core.style.fill
package.shortDescription: Different ways to fill a feature (color, texture ...)

package.name: org.openscales.core.style.marker
package.shortDescription: Markers define point feature rendering

package.name: org.openscales.core.style.stroke
package.shortDescription: Different way to draw feature strokes

package.name: org.openscales.core.style.symbolizer
package.shortDescription: For a specific rule, how to render this feature

package.name: org.openscales.core.tile
package.shortDescription: Tile (raster or vector) management
